categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Battle in the Red Yars system

During the Galactic Civil War in 5 ABY, Twi'lek New Republic General Hera Syndulla and her forces aboard the Star Destroyer Deliverance, who had continued their hunt for the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, managed to track the fighter wing and the bulk freighter Yadeez to the Red Yars system, where they engaged one another in a brief battle. However, the fighter wing managed to escape the system shortly thereafter when Hail Squadron pilots Chass na Chadic and Boyvech Toons loosed shots, but neither were in range when the fighter wing made the jump to lightspeed.
